ModMetaData.name: LMC073h.中央温度控制系统
ModMetaData.author: Vasu Mahesh (coldtoad)
ModMetaData.description: 汉化：jxb12306 Author jxb12306 FROM 3DM Localization Group 合集链接：http://bbs.3dmgame.com/thread-5842015-1-1.html A Mod which allows centralized air cooling/heating. Build Large Piped Air Climate Systems away from your buildings. 允许建造中央冷却/加热的空气模块。在远离建筑物的地方建造大型空气调节系统。
